properties.name: filter
properties.appliesTo: All elements. In SVG, it applies to container elements without the defs element, all graphics elements and the use element.
properties.animationType: See prose in Animation of Filters.

values.name: <url>
values.prose: A filter reference to a filter element. For example url(commonfilters.svg#filter). If the filter references a non-existent object or the referenced object is not a filter element, then the whole filter chain is ignored. No filter is applied to the object.

properties.name: flood-opacity
properties.computedValue: the specified value converted to a number, clamped to the range [0,1]

values.name: auto
values.prose: Indicates that the user agent can choose either the sRGB or linearRGB spaces for filter effects color operations. This option indicates that the author doesnâ€™t require that color operations occur in a particular color space.

values.name: sRGB
values.prose: Indicates that filter effects color operations should occur in the gamma-encoded sRGB color space.

values.name: linearRGB
values.prose: Indicates that filter effects color operations should occur in the linear-light sRGB color space.
